q1.question: Which communication channels do you support?
q1.answer: We support Official WhatsApp API, unofficial WhatsApp, Instagram DM and Webchat. All channels are centralized in a single screen so you never miss a message.

q2.question: Which AI models can I use?
q2.answer: We support the best AIs on the market: OpenAI (ChatGPT), Anthropic (Claude), Meta Llama, Mistral, DeepSeek and others. You can switch between them at any time.

q3.question: Does the platform have integrated CRM?
q3.answer: Yes! We have a complete CRM with lead management, tasks, deals, kanban sales funnel and complete conversation history. Each conversation automatically becomes a lead in the CRM.

q4.question: What's the difference with official WhatsApp API?
q4.answer: The Official API has a verified green badge and greater stability. We also offer unofficial API for those who prefer more flexibility. You choose the best option for your business.

q5.question: Do you have Instagram automation?
q5.answer: Yes! Create smart automations like 'reply I WANT and we'll send the link automatically via DM'. Perfect for launches and lead capture.

q6.question: Can I handle WhatsApp and Instagram together?
q6.answer: Absolutely! WhatsApp, Instagram DM and Webchat are all on a single screen. Centralize all your support and never miss a message again.

q7.question: How does the free trial work?
q7.answer: You have 7 days to test all platform features without commitment. No credit card required to start.

q8.question: Do I need technical knowledge?
q8.answer: No! Our platform was designed to be intuitive. Set up your agent in less than 5 minutes, just scan a QR code and you're ready.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: AutomateFlow is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when you use our artificial intelligence agents platform.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as name, email, phone number, and payment details when creating your account. We also automatically collect technical information such as IP address, browser type, pages visited, and access times. Additionally, we process conversations conducted through AI agents to improve our services and provide analytics to users.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use your information to provide and maintain our services, process payments and transactions, send communications about your account and platform updates, personalize your experience and improve our services, respond to support requests, comply with legal obligations, and detect and prevent fraud or malicious activities.

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share data with service providers who assist us in operations (such as payment processors), when required by law or court order, to protect our legal rights, or in case of company merger or acquisition. All third parties with whom we share data are required to protect your information.

storage.title: Storage and Retention
storage.content: Your data is stored on secure servers located in certified data centers. We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. After account closure, your data will be retained for up to 30 days for backup purposes and then permanently deleted, except when retention is required by law.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement robust technical and organizational measures to protect your information, including encryption of data in transit and at rest, firewalls and intrusion detection systems, strict access controls, continuous security monitoring, and regular audits. However, no system is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: In accordance with applicable data protection laws, you have the right to access your personal data, correct incorrect or outdated information, request deletion of your data, revoke previously granted consents, request data portability, and obtain information about data sharing. To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@automateflow.chat.

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience, remember your preferences, analyze platform usage, and personalize content. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. Note that disabling certain cookies may affect platform functionality.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for individuals under 18 years of age. We do not intentionally collect personal information from children or adolescents. If we become aware that we have collected data from a minor without parental consent, we will take steps to delete that information as quickly as possible.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of significant changes by email or through a notice on the platform. We recommend reviewing this policy regularly to stay informed about how we protect your data.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, please contact our Data Protection Officer (DPO) at privacy@automateflow.chat. We will respond to your request within the legally established timeframe.
